Package com.circa.mrv.grs_manager.directory

Class CompanyDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.circa.mrv.grs_manager.directory.CompanyDirectory
  • public class CompanyDirectory
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains a directory of all companies.
    Author:
    Arthur Vargas

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CompanyDirectory()
      Creates an empty company directory.
      CompanyDirectory​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String add1, java.lang.String add2, java.lang.String city, java.lang.String state, java.lang.String zip, java.lang.String country)
      Creates a new company directory with a single bill to location in the company directory's list.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean addCompany​(java.lang.String name, Location local)
      Adds a company with the name specified in the name parameter and a billing/office location defined by the local parameter.

      Adds a company with the name specified in the name parameter and a billing/office location defined by the address information passed into the corresponding parameters.

      Adds a company with the name specified in the name parameter and a billing/office location defined by the address information passed into the corresponding parameters.
      boolean addEmployeeToBillToLocation​(Employee emp, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String street)
      Searches the employee list of the company whose name matches parameter name and whose bill to street address matches the street parameter.
      void addResearchCompany​(ResearchCompany rc)
      Adds the ResearchCompany parameter to the list of companies instance variable.
      void addVendorCompany​(VendorCompany vc)
      Adds the VendorCompany parameter to the list of companies.
      Company getCompanyAt​(int index)
      Returns the company at index specified by index parameter
      Company getCompanyByName​(java.lang.String name)
      Gets the company, name, from the directory if the company name matches one in the directory.
      Company getCompanyByNameAndStreet​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String add1)
      Gets the company, name, from the directory if the company name matches one in the directory.
      java.lang.String[][] getCompanyDirectory()
      Returns all companies in the directory with a columns for name and address information.
      LinkedListRecursive<Company> getCompanyList()
      Returns a list with all companies in the GRS Manager

      Searches all of the locations in all of the companies in the directory and returns the employee whose id matches the string passed into getEmployeeById() method.

      Returns string array with research company employee data.
      java.lang.String[][] getVendorEmployeeData()
      Returns string array with vendor company employee data.

      void saveCompanyDirectory​(java.lang.String fileName)

    • Constructor Detail

      • CompanyDirectory

        public CompanyDirectory()
        Creates an empty company directory.

      • CompanyDirectory

        public CompanyDirectory​(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String add1,
                        java.lang.String add2,
                        java.lang.String city,
                        java.lang.String state,
                        java.lang.String zip,
                        java.lang.String country)
        Creates a new company directory with a single bill to location in the company directory's list.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the company
        add1 - the street address of the company
        add2 - the suite or bldg number for the company
        city - the city the company is in
        state - the state the company is in
        zip - the zip code for the compnay
        country - the country where the company is located

    • Method Detail

      • newCompanyDirectory

        public void newCompanyDirectory()
        Creates an empty company directory. All companies in the previous list are lost unless saved by the user.

      • getCompanyAt

        public Company getCompanyAt​(int index)
        Returns the company at index specified by index parameter
        Parameters:
        index - the index in the directory
        Returns:
        company the company

      • loadCompanyFromFile

        public void loadCompanyFromFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
        Constructs the Company directory by reading in Company information from the given file. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the file cannot be found.
        Parameters:
        fileName - file containing list of Companies

      • addCompany

        public boolean addCompany​(java.lang.String name,
                          Location local)
        Adds a company with the name specified in the name parameter and a billing/office location defined by the local parameter. Returns true if the company is added and false if the company is unable to be added because their name and address match another company. Throws an IAE if the company is not a current GRS customer.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the company
        local - a bill-to location
        Returns:
        true if added
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the company is not eRT or Circassia.

        Parameters:

        Throws:

        Throws:

      • removeCompany

        public boolean removeCompany​(java.lang.String name)
        Removes the company with the given name from the list of companies. Returns true if the company is removed and false if the employee is not in the list.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the company
        Returns:
        true if removed

      • getCompanyList

        public LinkedListRecursive<Company> getCompanyList()
        Returns a list with all companies in the GRS Manager
        Returns:
        companyDirectory the list of companies in GRS

      • getCompanyDirectory

        public java.lang.String[][] getCompanyDirectory()
        Returns all companies in the directory with a columns for name and address information.
        Returns:
        String array containing company's name and address info.

      • saveCompanyDirectory

        public void saveCompanyDirectory​(java.lang.String fileName)
        Saves all companies in the directory to a file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of file to save company to.

      • getCompanyByName

        public Company getCompanyByName​(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the company, name, from the directory if the company name matches one in the directory.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the company
        Returns:
        the company. If no match is found, null is returned.

      • getCompanyByNameAndStreet

        public Company getCompanyByNameAndStreet​(java.lang.String name,
                                         java.lang.String add1)
        Gets the company, name, from the directory if the company name matches one in the directory.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the company
        add1 - the street address of company bill to
        Returns:
        the company. If no match is found, null is returned.

      • getEmployeeById

        public Employee getEmployeeById​(java.lang.String id)
        Searches all of the locations in all of the companies in the directory and returns the employee whose id matches the string passed into getEmployeeById() method. If no employee is found matching this id getEmployeeById() returns null.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique id for this employee
        Returns:
        the employee whose id matches the id parameter

      • addEmployeeToBillToLocation

        public boolean addEmployeeToBillToLocation​(Employee emp,
                                           java.lang.String name,
                                           java.lang.String street)
        Searches the employee list of the company whose name matches parameter name and whose bill to street address matches the street parameter.
        Parameters:
        emp - the employee to add to the bill to
        name - the name of the company
        street - the street address of the bil to
        Returns:
        true if the employee is successfully added.

        employees the research employees
